United States: Computer Fraud and Abuse Act (CFAA): Prohibits accessing a computer without authorization, or in excess of authorization
Electronic Communications Privacy Act: Protects against unauthorized interception of electronic communications
Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA): Regulates the collection of personal information from children under 13
United Kingdom: Computer Misuse Act 1990: Criminalizes unauthorized access to computer systems
Data Protection Act 2018: Implements GDPR requirements and protects personal data
Network and Information Systems Regulations 2018: Ensures security of network and information systems
India: Information Technology Act, 2000: Primary law dealing with cybercrime and electronic commerce
Personal Data Protection Bill: Comprehensive framework for personal data protection
National Cyber Security Policy: Guidelines for protecting cyber assets
Australia: Privacy Act 1988: Regulates handling of personal information
Security of Critical Infrastructure Act 2018: Protects critical infrastructure from cyber threats
